titles.title: Reducing Energy Use Through Retrofitting Older Vehicles Act
RETRO Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for the retrofit conversion of a nonhybrid motor vehicle to a hybrid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary: 11/29/2011--Introduced. Reducing Energy Use Through Retrofitting Older Vehicles Act or the RETRO Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for the cost of converting a motor vehicle into a hybrid motor vehicle, based on gross vehicle weight. Limits the number of converted motor vehicles eligible for such credit. Terminates such credit five years after the enactment of this Act.
